text: my name is gerald and i'm a solutions
architect manager the reason why i think
it's really cool to grow your career
here at aws is i look at aws as a candy
store imagine a child that goes into a
store for the first time and it's like
oh i see the first thing that i like and
then look around you see that there's
more candy and there's more
opportunities when new folks come on to
aws i tend to use that analogy to help
them realize that what you think today
is like your favorite flavor or your
favorite candy
tomorrow changes but there's so much
more that you can do here so i think
it's a really cool place to to to grow
your career
[Music]
i like the fact that our culture it's a
day one culture we're always thinking
about
customers and like what's new what's
innovative what can we build to change
the world
aws is an inclusive employer because
what we demonstrate is not just about
hiring but it's the investments that we
make in the different communities and
the different cultures around the globe
we're actually feeling talent from
different areas and are totally willing
to partner with that talent to have them
work virtually work in an environment
that they're comfortable with and help
us really innovate and build for the
future
[Music]
